result.pre: This study has revealed that the coniferous species,
result.post: , has a distinct cp genome compared to previously reported land plant cp genomes. In terms of gene
result.name: binomial

result.pre: pared to previously reported land plant cp genomes. In terms of gene content, several genes in the
result.post: cp genome differ significantly, having either been lost or diverged, from those of other land plant
result.name: binomial

result.pre: nificantly. The deleted large IRs and the numerous genome rearrangements that have occurred in the
result.post: cp genome have provided new insights into the evolutionary lineage of conifers. However, as the com
result.name: binomial
